content: **pattern information** this crochet cardigan pattern includes crochet abbreviations in u s terms hook and yarn suggestions friends cotton 8/6 3 mm and 4 mm hooks gauge written pattern **skills level ** intermediate **used stitches ** slip_stitch chain single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet double_crochet 2 stitches together treble_crochet 2 stitches together x-stitch puff **measurements** width 46 52 59 64 71 cm / 18 20 5 23 2 25 2 28 height 57 65 67 74 81 cm / 22 2 25 6 26 4 29 32 sleeve length from the armhole 40 40 45 45 45 cm / 15 7 15 7 17 7 17 7 17 7 sleeve width the widest place 17 19 20 22 23 5 cm / 6 7 7 5 7 9 8 7 9 3 let s have fun **materials** 4 4 5 5 6 skeins of friends cotton 8/6 color 119 c3 3 3 4 5 6 skeins of friends cotton 8/6 colors 120 c1 and 76 c2 2 2 3 3 4 skeins of friends cotton 8/6 colors 112 c5 and 122 c4 crochet hooks 3 mm and 4 mm stitch markers scissors needle tape measure **yarn quality** friends cotton 8/6 hobbii 100 % cotton 50 g / 1 75 oz = 105 m / 115 yds
